post.author: 이상윤
post.content:
Title: Developer

Duration: 3 months to start with extension possibility

Location: Downtown Toronto

Pay rate:  $45-$50.00 per hour INC.

Skills needed: an intermediate role with min 5 years experience as a developer, with proven experience with MS SQL Server \\\\ VB.Net & ASP.Net development.

Nature of assignment:  Will be developing a Reporting & view only screen views into a main registry application.

Start Date:  Mid August, or possibly a bit sooner.

Joseph Catricala
Recruitment Consultant
joseph@nexstaf.com
post.title: 3 month contract
